abilities.name: Commanding Aura
abilities.text: As long as Hariyama ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Stadium cards from his or her hand.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Pivot Throw
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Hariyama ex by attacks is increased by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
